programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: Rayford, a stubborn returnee from America disrespects his dad and grand mum. However, this is about to stop as his grandma device a means to make him humble.

programme.title: The City Wife
programme.desc: A village tailor arrives in the city to celebrate Christmas with his educated and successful fiancee, but he is shamed and sent out as she plans for her celebrity wedding.

programme.title: 2 Lives
programme.desc: Chief prepares and plans his daughter Janice into a family just for his own gains, but the worst hits and tables turn as love intercepts his plans.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nnanna deals with the fall out of Nwoyes rejected proposal. Adanna and Mmesoma have a narrow escape.

programme.title: Her Holiness
programme.desc: Elizabeth frustrates John her husband with her spirituality, this continues and destroys the marriage as John is being pushed to the wall.

programme.title: A Life Like Hers
programme.desc: Dora and her daughter endure a life of loneliness and poverty until they cross paths with George, whose presence promised to change their fortunes.

programme.title: Cry Of The Pregnant Ghost
programme.desc: Collins gets a young village girl pregnant and refuse to take responsibility, this decision makes the girl seek other options.

programme.title: The Past The Ugly
programme.desc: Charles is once entangled with Medlines mother, but now back to marry Medline and leaves the past behind. However, the past has a way of never letting go.

programme.title: Heal My Scars
programme.desc: Benson is about to become a worse version of himself as his wife Chekwube will deny him of all marital duties.

programme.title: Undead Bride
programme.desc: When Afamefuna tries to say his vows to his wife, a spirit present, listens and accepts the vows. This puts him in a big dilemma.

programme.title: Even In Death
programme.desc: Ikenna and Oma die mysteriously but they decide to go back to the land of the living to continue living as no one knows that they were dead.

programme.title: Thank God Its Friday
programme.desc: Leonard finds himself torn between his love for Monique and Kaka. His indecisiveness about who to commit to eternally leaves everyone wondering who he will ultimately choose.

programme.title: My Akawo
programme.desc: Monica the village thrift collector is doing everything to make sure peoples money are safe, but her sister is about to destroy everything she has worked.

programme.title: Chaos Within
programme.desc: Sandra goes against her mothers advise and invited her stepsister Oluchi into her matrimonial home, now she will lose everything to Oluchis wicked claws.

programme.title: Airdrop
programme.desc: Benita relentlessly pursues Smith, her best friends man. As blackmail and manipulation unfold when a compromising video surfaces, suspicions arise, pointing to Benita.

programme.title: The Next King
programme.desc: Uncle Lalala is chosen to be king, but Angelina will do everything not to let this work as she suspects that Uncle Lalala killed his brother Ejike.

programme.title: Family Woes
programme.desc: Ebuka and her sister will suffer for a sin they didnt have a hand in, as their uncle frustrates their entire family just to pay back Egodi for not marrying him.

programme.title: Evil Doers
programme.desc: Onowo and Okeke relentlessly pursue village widows. Their plan to prey on an innocent widow, Ogechi, and frame her is set in motion. However, the divine forces intervene.

programme.title: The Love I Found
programme.desc: Kachis world changes when he falls in love with Nkem, a young mother shunned by her village and even ridiculed by her own family because of an abominable act.

programme.title: On My Honour
programme.desc: A king couldnt get his wife pregnant, so they decide to have Ure as their surrogate mum, then the unthinkable happens.

programme.title: The Witness
programme.desc: Okey and Nonso ruthlessly murders their boss and his wife for financial gain. Their daughter stumbles upon the gruesome scene and becomes a target.

programme.title: Fates Scribble
programme.desc: Fresh out of jail, Dami, a single mother, embarks on a frantic quest to find her daughter, who has been sold and trafficked by the person she trusted as her guardian.

programme.title: Nanny
programme.desc: Naomi struggles to care for her fiances daughter, feeling detached as she did not birth her. She prefers hiring a nanny to prioritize more time with her fiance.

programme.title: Moment Of Truth
programme.desc: Max is accused by his wife for being impotent, little did she know that her friends children belong to her husband. This brews war as Max starts asking questions.

programme.title: Branded Love
programme.desc: A social media stars efforts to balance work and parenting with strict measures backfire as neglect impacts her family, leading to unforeseen consequences. Watch it unfold!

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: the tale of Dayo, a gullible but optimistic young man who moves to Lagos with dreams of making it big.

programme.title: The Rishantes

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: A revenge-filled thriller driven by Jason Statham. A former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers is on a brutal campaign for vengeance.

programme.title: Fear The Night
programme.desc: Maggie Q drives this action thriller. An Iraqi war veteran prepares to strike back after a group of home invaders attack during her sisters bachelorette party.

programme.title: Killing Field
programme.desc: Chad Michael Murray and Bruce Willis star in this action thriller. A grieving battle veterans life is disrupted when a cop and a drug cartel arrive on his property.

programme.title: Perfectly Single
programme.desc: A conservative and socially awkward optometrist takes a leap of faith with a young suitor. Soon, her journey leads her down a path to self-discovery.

programme.title: Shamed
programme.desc: A delightful romcom. A magazine editor goes on an island trip to clear her mind and focus on her infamous Shamed List column, only to fall for one of the men on her List.

programme.title: Christmas Couples Retreat
programme.desc: An enjoyable Christmas movie that follows three couples who attend a retreat hoping to strengthen their respective relationships with the help of a relationship guru.

programme.title: The Holiday Dating Guide
programme.desc: A delightful holiday romcom. To satisfy her publisher, a dating coach must prove her advice works by making a man fall for her by Christmas Eve in 12 days.

programme.title: My Sweet Monster
programme.desc: An animated musical for the family. Princess Barbara flees her wedding and meets a sweet monster and his pal, who help save her kingdom from an evil postman.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale
programme.desc: A touching film. After rescuing a dolphin from a trap, a boy learns that the animals tail must be amputated, prompting him to convince a marine biologist to devise a solution.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic...
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Kevin Hart lends his voice to this colourful superhero animation. Two pranksters hypnotise their principal into believing hes a superhero.

programme.title: Nanny Mcphee And The Big Bang
programme.desc: Oscar winner Emma Thompson writes and stars in this fun family film. A mysterious nanny arrives to help a struggling mom with her kids and the farm while their father is at war.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Iconic martial arts actor Jackie Chan drives this action-adventure film. A highly trained security company is hired to protect an accountant after a mercenary group targets him.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Tom Cruise messes with forces unknown in this reboot. While trying to steal artefacts in the Middle East, a soldier accidentally awakens an ancient, malevolent princess.

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: Vin Diesel and Paul Walker return for an explosive crime movie driven by nitro and betrayal. The crew tries to take down a drug lord - with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Hitmans Wifes Bodyguard
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds and Samuel L. Jackson return as Michael and Darius respectively. The two continue their friendship as they try to save Darius wife, Sonia (Salma Hayek).

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Director Michael Mann (Heat) teams up with Golden Globe winner Colin Farrell and Oscar winner Jamie Foxx to reboot the 80s classic crime show about Miamis top vice detectives.

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Colin Farrell takes centre stage in this dark crime comedy. After a job gone wrong, two Irish hitmen are told to lay low in Belgium, but they find themselves in trouble.

programme.title: Deadly DILF
programme.desc: A compelling thriller. A harmless flirtation between a college girl and the hot dad next door turns deadly when she becomes obsessed with him and tries to destroy his marriage.

programme.title: Prisoner Of Love
programme.desc: Inspired by a real-life romantic crime story. A corrections officer falls in love with an inmate and helps him break him out of jail.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: This historical drama ties the loose ends of an award-winning show of the same name. It shows the lives of a family and its servants as they navigate through changes in society.

programme.title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now...
programme.sub-title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now I Feel Kinda Left Out
programme.desc: A sci-fi comedy. A teen girl helps her space-obsessed neighbour to find his parents, whom aliens might have abducted.

programme.title: How The Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Dr. Seuss How The Grinch Stole Christmas. Jim Carrey plays the infamous Grinch, a creature who hates Christmas and plots to steal it.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale 2
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Ashley Judd star in this sequel about friendship as a group of people in a marine hospital try and help a dolphin find a companion.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: This adorable animation with an ensemble cast explores the world inside our phones, where emojis live and one multi-expressional emoji heads off on an adventure to discover his purpose.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: Will Smith fights for survival in this gripping post-apocalyptic film. When a plague kills most of mankind and changes the rest into monsters, a man fights to find a cure.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Andrew Garfield returns for a second round of web-slinging action. Dangerous new enemies and family secrets weigh heavy on young Peter Parker as he struggles with his destiny.

programme.title: The Marksman
programme.desc: Liam Neeson takes matters into his own hands in this action thriller. A rancher on the Arizona border defends a young Mexican boy fleeing the cartel assassins.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Oscar nominated actor, Samuel L. Jackson plays the legendary 1970s character in this action thriller. Shaft makes it his personal mission to bring a murderer to justice.

programme.title: Assassin
programme.desc: South African star Nomzamo Mbatha stars alongside Bruce Willis in this sci-fi action thriller. A widow takes on a mission to bring the man responsible for her husbands death to justice.

programme.title: The Last Job
programme.desc: Oscar winner Richard Dreyfuss seeks revenge on those who wronged him in this thriller. After his savings are stolen, a former mob boss returns to his old ways to find the thieves.

programme.title: Dead Trigger: Unkilled
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic film that sees an elite soldier unit stepping in to save humanity when a virus decimates the world and creates zombie hordes.

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: A third rate motorcycle daredevil and semi-reformed art thief, agrees to get back into the con game and pull off just one more lucrative art theft with his untrustworthy brother.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Divorce mediators John Beck with and Jeremy Grey crash weddings to meet single women. But the guys lives change abruptly when one of them unexpectedly falls in love with a bridesmaid.

programme.title: 30 Minutes Or Less
programme.desc: The tale of three slacker friends and the adventures that ensure after one of them inadvertently robs a bank armed only with a large salami.

programme.title: Bruce Willis: All American Hero
programme.desc: Bruce Willis is one of the all-time greats an action hero with an incredible body of workout was his portrayal of police officer John McClane in Die Hard that catapulted to stardom.

programme.title: Batman and Robin
programme.desc: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

programme.title: Marilyn Monroe: Beauty Is Pain
programme.desc: Marilyn Monroe is easily the most iconic woman of 20th Century Hollywood, from hot pink gowns to an iconic white dress flying towards the sky over a subway grate, .

programme.title: Houseguest
programme.desc: In hot water with the mob over an unpaid debt, a con man poses as a family friend in an affluent Pennsylvania suburb.

programme.title: Murder On The Orient Express
programme.desc: When a murder occurs on the train on which hes travelling, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.

programme.title: The Distinguished Gentleman
programme.desc: The Distinguished Gentleman, a hilarious comedy about a small-time con man who runs for Congress and miraculously wins! As Thomas Jefferson Johnson, Murphy hustles his way to the big time.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last-ditch effort to survive and uncover the assailants.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: A mercenary delivery man finds his world turned upside down when a package he has been hired to transport turns out to be a kidnapped young woman.

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns as a highly skilled driver and ex-commando whos called back into action when ruthless kidnappers abduct a young boy from a wealthy family.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Fed up with answering to higher-ups, Nick, Dale and Kurt decide to become their own bosses by launching their own business. But a slick investor soon pulls the rug out from under them.

programme.title: Sharknado: Feeding Frenzy
programme.desc: What began as another Syfy creature feature has now become an important piece of pop culture - poised to take over the entire world.

programme.title: Sharknado: Heart Of Sharkness
programme.desc: A mockumentary about David Moore, the filmmaker who first dreamed of sharks in a tornado and brought on disaster by using real sharks.

programme.title: The Last Sharknado: Its About Time
programme.desc: Fin has to go back in time to rejoin his shark-battling friends to stop the first Sharknado and save humanity.

programme.title: Jamie Foxx: Secret To Success
programme.desc: A comprehensive look at the life and career of veteran actor Jamie Foxx. From starting out in comedy to Oscar wins and nominations, Foxxs career has been nothing short of success.

programme.title: Adulting
programme.desc: Adulting is about an unlikely duo, Katie and Charlie, who take their first stab at the real world together and attempt to be adults.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: Thousands of lives are at stake as ordinary heroes try to stop a runaway train transporting toxic chemicals in this action-thriller starring Denzel Washington and Chris Pine!

programme.title: Jamie Foxx: Secret To Success
programme.desc: A comprehensive look at the life and career of veteran actor Jamie Foxx. From starting out in comedy to Oscar wins and nominations, Foxxs career has been nothing short of success.

programme.title: I Am Sam
programme.desc: Can a mentally challenged man be a good father? Sean Penn and Michelle Pfeiffer star in the moving story of unconditional love that grows between a man, his daughter and the attorney.

programme.title: Enough Said
programme.desc: A divorced masseuse starts dating a sweet but somewhat clueless man with whom she shares a fun rapport, only to discover that hes her new friends ex-husband.

programme.title: Coyote Ugly
programme.desc: Moving to New York to pursue her dreams of becoming a famous songwriter, Violet Sanford finds herself desperate and broke.

programme.title: Holy Man
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as an over-the-top television evangelist who finds a way to turn television home shopping into a religious experience, and takes America by storm.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances, and reward their audiences with the money.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: An ex-killer for the mob, is kidnapped and injected with microscopic computers called nanites. They erase his brain and rebuild it for his body to be a weapon with superhuman strength.

programme.title: War Of The Worlds
programme.desc: An alien invasion threatens the future of humanity. The catastrophic nightmare is depicted through the eyes of one American family fighting for survival.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: Ben Affleck stars as a math savant whos closer to numbers than people. Behind the cover of his small-town CPA office, he works for the worlds most dangerous criminals.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: After his wife and family are killed, G Man Frank Castle takes it upon himself to rid America of crime by acting as judge, jury and executioner.

programme.title: John Q
programme.desc: John Q takes an unwitting group of people hostage in the hospital emergency room and now he and many others need medical care.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and Amy Poehler star in this high-stakes comedy about two parents who lose their daughters college fund. Desperate to earn it back, they open up an illegal casino.

programme.title: Whoopi Goldberg: The Winning Act
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg is an award-winning comedian, actress and human rights advocate, also known for her work in television and recordings.
